item.title: Towards a Sociology of Rivalry
item.description:
Towards a Sociology of Rivalry code{white-space: pre;} 2015-12-22T22:59:13-07:00 Towards a Sociology of Rivalry Abstract: Initial thoughts on rivalry as a distinct sociological construct. I wrote much of the following in Spring 2011.
Introduction Uzzi (1996) makes the embeddedness hypothesis (Granovetter 1985) actionable; his results suggest that the degree to which a firm concentrates its exchange in few or many partners, and the degree to which a firm’s partners do the same, matter to a focal firm’s survival.
